coding.display: Part A institutional claim record (inpatient [IP], skilled nursing facility [SNF], hospice [HOS], or home health agency [HHA])

Emergency - The patient required immediate medical intervention as a result of severe, life threatening, or potentially disabling conditions. Generally, the patient was admitted through the emergency room.
Claim Medicare Non Utilization Days Count

Claim PPS Capital Indirect Medical Education (IME) Amount
Claim PPS Old Capital Hold Harmless Amount
